name: Hike from Hell
description: You had plans to have a fun day at the beach with your friends when all of a sudden you decided to sleep in and miss the window to hangout with them at the beach. Later  on at night you deicide to head over to Gavin Heights for a late night stroll.  Everything was going okay  and you were just minding your own business. A couple mins later you start to notice something follow you. A giant man weighing in at 400 pounds. He had white hair and a white beard and he started to gain up on you. You were stressed and panicked not knowing if you were going to survive or not. Find out throughout the short game A Hike from Hell if you live or if you die!!
